entry.title: emacs-straight/svg-lib
entry.summary:
Mirror of the svg-lib package from GNU ELPA, current as of 2023-02-03

*** SVG Library

A small Emacs library to create and display various SVG objects, namely tags, progress bars, progress pies and icons. Each object is guaranteed to fit nicely in a text buffer ensuring width is an integer multiple of character width.

*** Installation

#+begin_src elisp M-x package-install RET svg-lib RET #+end_src

*** Usage example

[[file:screenshot.png]]

[[file:screenshot-2.png]]
